text: Nukuba tandukanya abamye ari ababeshi nabo babwiwe bati:- nimuze murwane munzira y’Imana canke muzitire, nabo baciye bavuga bati:- iyo tubimenya yuko hariho ingwano, ntankeka twari kuba kurikira kuko wamusi bari hafi y’ubuhakanyi gusumba ubu Isilamu, bavugisha iminwa yabo gusa kubitari mumishaha yabo, n’Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi buhagije bwivyo bagira vyose
